H929.def: often used as collective: = general term for any land animal, as opposed to {L:humans<SDBH:אָדָם>}, {L:birds<SDBH:עֹוף>}, {L:reptiles<SDBH:רֶמֶשׂ>}, {L:insects<SDBH:שֶׁרֶץ>}, and {L:fish<SDBH:דָּג>}

H676.def: = one of the five long and slender projections of the human hand; ► used for writing, pointing, grasping, and other activities; ≈ sometimes used metonymically to represent the entire body

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H2748.def: = title of priest skilled in magic and soothsaying; ◄ found both in Egypt and Babylon; ► working at the royal court

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3820.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H2388.def: = state in which humans or deities are strong in a physical, political, or military sense, or simply in their ability to convince others with words

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H1242.def: = first half of the day, ranging from daybreak until noon; ≈ used figuratively to denote relief after a time of suffering, and associated with good as opposed to evil

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H4325.def: = water as the indispensible liquid on which the existence of all life depends, used for drinking, preparing food, washing, irrigating, etc.; found under the earth, on the earth, and above the earth; sometimes used as a euphemism to denote certain body liquids; ≈ associated with abundance and refreshment, but also with instability, and danger, etc.

H3320.def: = action by which humans or deities take position in a certain place for a specific purpose

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H5647.def: = state in which humans, either as individuals or as groups, are in a position of subservience towards (other) individuals or groups, which is normally accompanied by a number of duties, tasks and obligations

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H369.def: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non-existant

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H6157.def: literally: mixture; possibly a general term for a large group of insects

H5650.def: = man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H127.def: = the surface of the earth, containing the substance that God used to create animals and humans, and to which they return when they die; on this surface plants and trees grow, humans labor to grow crops and worship God, who sustains all life, but who can also strike it with a curse so that nothing grows again

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H4390.def: = state or process in which a certain location, container, or surface is filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H6395.def: = state in which one group of people differs from another

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H1657.def: = region; ◄ located in eastern {L:Egyptian<SDBH:מִצְרִי>} delta; ► where {L:Israelites<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} lived from the time they settled in the country until the exodus

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H5975.def: = process by which humans, deities, animals, or inanimate objects take position in a certain location in an upright position

H1115.def: = particle marking a proposition as not true

H6157.def: literally: mixture; possibly a general term for a large group of insects

H3045.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H6304.def: literally: redemption; hence: = causative action by which deities help humans out of a dangerous, life-threatening, or otherwise difficult situation

H996.def: = the area separating two or mores locations

H226.def: = an object that represents and identifies a group of people; in the form of a flag or a metal or wooden board, often with an image; attached to a pole so that it can be carried; used in both military and religious contexts

H4279.def: = a reference to the day after the current day

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H3515.def: = state in which an object has relatively much weight, ≈ which is often associated with slowness, functioning with difficulty, but also with importance, riches, status, etc.

H6157.def: literally: mixture; possibly a general term for a large group of insects

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H5650.def: = man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

H4714.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}; ► regarded as founder of the {L:Egyptian<SDBH:מִצְרִי>} nation

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H7843.def: = process by which objects are affected by violence, destruction, putrefaction, pollution, blemishes, and other factors that may have a destructive impact

H7121.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H175.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}; brother of {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► first high {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}
